scripts.compile-examples-js: babel examples/src/app/index/index.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/index/index.js && babel examples/src/app/images/images.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/images/images.js && babel examples/src/app/table/table.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/table/table.js && babel examples/src/app/short/short.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/short/short.js && babel examples/src/app/grid/grid.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/grid/grid.js && babel examples/src/app/horizontal/horizontal.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/horizontal/horizontal.js
scripts.update-source: sass --update --sourcemap=none lib/ && babel lib/infinite.es6.js --out-file lib/infinite.js && cp lib/infinite.js examples/src/lib/infinite/ && cp lib/infinite.css examples/src/lib/infinite/
scripts.compile-examples: npm run compile-examples-css && npm run compile-examples-js
scripts.build-examples: npm run compile-examples && node scripts/build-examples.js examples
scripts.github: rm -rf ../gh-pages/app && rm -rf ../gh-pages/*.html && rm -rf ../gh-pages/lib && rm -rf ../gh-pages/config.js && npm run build-examples && npm run copy-to-gh
